LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-04T13:59:41Z Carson, Christina 2015-02-04T13:59:35+00:00 2015-02-04T13:59:35+00:00 Professional Registration Explained https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;bdabd4a5.1502 CILIP South West Members Network would like to invite you to -<br><br>Professional Registration Explained<br>Friday 10th April, 2015<br>10.00 - 15.30 (Registration/coffee at 10.00, to start at 10.30)<br>Meeting Room, Plymouth Central Library, Drake Circus, Plymouth PL4 8AL<br><br>This event is free of charge. Lunch is not provided.<br><br>An opportunity to learn more about the professional registration process, meet other candidates and network.<br>This event is aimed at new, and potential ACLIP, MCLIP, FCLIP candidates and CILIP mentors. It would be very helpful in preparing for the day to have an idea of which level candidates are working towards. [...] Claire Back 2014-11-23T18:38:58+00:00 2014-11-23T18:38:58+00:00 Re: Gadget Day - Date change https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;414ddfab.1411 Hello<br><br>Apologies for the very late reply to this one.<br><br>The day supports the following sections of CILIP's PKSB<br><br>2 Knowledge and Information Managment<br>2.7 Knowledge Sharing and collaboration<br><br>12 IT and Communication<br>12.4 Social Media and collaborative tools<br>12.5 Communication Skills<br>12.6 Networking Skills<br><br>Let me know if you need any more information<br><br>Claire<br><br>On Thursday, 23 October 2014, Jackson, Jim <J.G.Jackson@exeter.ac.uk> wrote: [...] Jackson, Jim 2014-10-23T08:55:00+00:00 2014-10-23T08:55:00+00:00 Re: Gadget Day - Date change https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;98372933.1410 Can you please provide some clear leaning objectives for the day as I will need these before we can discuss the number of people attending from Exeter?<br><br>Thanks<br><br>Jim Jackson<br>Library Supervisor<br>Please note my working locations:<br>Monday, Thursday and Friday 9.00am to 5.15pm St Lukes Library, Heavitree Road, Exeter. EX1 2LU<br>Tuesday and Wednesday 9.00am to 5.15pm Forum Library, Stocker Road, Exeter EX4 4PT<br>Telephone 01392 726147<br>Email J.G.Jackson@exeter.ac.uk<mailto:J.G.Jackson@exeter.ac.uk><br>www.exeter.ac.uk<http://www.exeter.ac.uk/><br>[http://www.exeter.ac.uk/codebox/email-sig/images/sig.gif]<http://www.exeter.ac.uk/> [...] Claire Back 2014-10-22T18:49:07+01:00 2014-10-22T18:49:07+01:00 Gadget Day - Date change https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;de5cc2f.1410 Hello<br><br>Due to unforseen circumstances the date for the SW Gadget Day 2014 has<br>changed.<br><br>It will now take place at Cornwall College on Friday 12 December from<br>10.30am to 3.30pm<br><br>Everything else is the same, more information and booking here:<br><br>http://bit.ly/SWGadgetDay14<br><br>Claire Claire Back 2014-10-20T19:15:25+01:00 2014-10-20T19:15:25+01:00 Gadget Day 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;82b938f3.1410 SW Gadget Day<br>Cornwall College<br>Friday 31 October: 10.30am to 3.30pm<br><br>The South West Gadget Day will help library staff to understand some of the<br>issues surrounding the use of new technologies in libraries and to learn<br>from those already doing it.<br><br>We hope to attract a mix of those with little knowledge and more<br>experienced users who are happy and willing to share what they know in an<br>informal, relaxed atmosphere. [...] Carson, Christina 2014-09-23T12:18:05+00:00 2014-09-23T12:18:05+00:00 Professional registration https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;ea041ae3.1409 CILIP South West Members Network would like to invite you to -<br><br>Professional Registration Explained<br>Friday 14th November, 2014<br>10.00 - 15.30 (Registration/coffee at 10.00, to start at 10.30)<br>Meeting Room 4, Exeter Central Library.<br><br>This event is free of charge.<br><br>An opportunity to learn more about the professional registration process, meet other candidates and have a guided tour of the newly refurbished Exeter Central Library. This event is aimed at new, and potential ACLIP, MCLIP candidates, and CILIP mentors.<br>The event will cover -<br>What is Professional Registration?<br>Criteria for Assessment - What the Assessors are Looking For<br>Reflective [...] Claire Stevens 2014-08-01T13:24:24+00:00 2014-08-01T13:24:24+00:00 Chartership support picnic at Marjon in Plymouth, next Sat Aug 9th https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;917b30a2.1408 Hi All<br><br>Just a reminder that we are hoping to run an informal Chartership picnic next Saturday August 9th at University of St Mark & St John (Marjon) in Plymouth 11am-3pm. The plan is for this to be an informal support session to keep each other motivated, followed by a tour of the Library. [...] Claire Stevens 2014-07-18T20:21:53+00:00 2014-07-18T20:21:53+00:00 Chartership picnic Aug 9th at Marjon, Plymouth https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;df69f68e.1407 Calling all chartership candidates in Plymouth & local area!<br><br>We are holding a chartership picnic at Marjon on Saturday August 9th 11am-3pm. Hoping for an informal (and sunny) day, discussing issues and keeping each other motivated (and maybe even actually doing some work!), followed by an optional tour of Marjon Library - the library is closed at weekends over the summer, so you will be very privileged! [...] Anne Howard 2014-06-30T19:56:06+00:00 2014-06-30T19:56:06+00:00 Please join my network on LinkedIn https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;f675a5ec.1406 Hi ,<br><br>I'd like to add you to my professional network on LinkedIn.<br><br>- Anne<br><br>Accept: https://www.linkedin.com/e/v2?e=w0rbgf-hx27hy2o-3z&a=preRegInvite&tracking=eml-guest-invite-cta&ek=invite_guest&invitationID=5889466046179467264&sharedKey=7aqYKrO8<br><br>You are receiving Invitation emails. Unsubscribe here: https://www.linkedin.com/e/v2?e=w0rbgf-hx27hy2o-3z&t=uns&tracking=eml-guest-invite-unsubscribe&ek=invite_guest&id=20061&mid=-1&aid=eutp0hdfqmhkmrr&eid=w0rbgf-hx27hy2o-3z&email=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS%40JISCMAIL%2EAC%2EUK<br><br>Learn why we included this at the following link: http://www.linkedin.com/e/v2?e=w0rbgf-hx27hy2o-3z&a=customerServiceUrl&ek=invite_guest&articleId=4788 Sarah Bedford 2014-05-09T15:44:35+01:00 2014-05-09T15:44:35+01:00 CILIP ARLG Southern AGM and CPD Event - UPDATE https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;168faa9d.1405 Hartley Library Conference Room, Southampton University<br><br>Friday 16th May from 10am to 12noon:<br><br>Free<br><br>CILIP ARLG Southern AGM plus Franko Kowalczuk (CILIP Candidate Support Officer) on CILIP's new Professional Registration processes, Professional Knowledge and Skills Base, and VLE for online portfolios and Revalidation.<br><br>Book for the free morning at http://eventbrite.co.uk/event/11281823237utm_source=eb_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=new_eventv2&utm_term=eventurl_text<br><br>Full details at http://www.cilip.org.uk/academic-and-research-libraries-group/events/southern-agm-plus-cpd-event<br><br>All welcome, particularly librarians in academic (FE and HE) and research libraries in the South. We look forward to meeting you. please bring examples of any done in your library, and Steve Rose (Southampton Solent Uni Head of Library and Learning Services) & Lisa White [...] Susan Renshaw 2014-04-10T14:29:59+01:00 2014-04-10T14:29:59+01:00 Visit to Jane Austen's Bath https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;96b6ab0a.1404 Hurry - 2 places left!<br><br>Day Out in Bath<br>Saturday 10th May 2014<br><br>- Visit to the Jane Austen Centre<br>- Lunch at a local pub (not included in the cost)<br>- Walking tour of Bath<br><br>11.00 am till 3.30 pm (approximately)<br><br>Visit to the Jane Austen Centre 11.00 am<br>Jane Austen lived in Bath between 1801 and 1806 and the Jane Austen Centre has an exhibition which tells the story of her experiences during this period.<br>For more information go to the website:<br>http://www.janeausten.co.uk/the-jane-austen-centre/exhibition/ [...] Lizz Jennings 2014-04-07T10:12:56+01:00 2014-04-07T10:12:56+01:00 Fwd: Vacancy in North Somerset https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;feb340a0.1404 Forwarded on behalf of:<br>*<br>Andy Brisley*,<br><br>Library & Information Manager,<br>North Somerset Council,<br>Floor 1, Post Point 18,<br>Town Hall,<br>Walliscote Grove Road,<br>Weston-super-Mare,<br>BS23 1UJ<br><br>Tel: 01934 42 6658<br>Mobile: 07584 607194<br><br>E<br>mail:___andy.brisley@n-somerset.gov.uk_<mailto:andy.brisley@n-somerset.gov.uk><br><br>Website:___www.n-somerset.gov.uk_<http://www.n-somerset.gov.uk/><br><br>Library<br>catalogue:___www.librarieswest.org.uk_<file://www.librarieswest.org.uk%20> Susan Renshaw 2014-04-03T09:10:57+01:00 2014-04-03T09:10:57+01:00 CILIP HIOW Visit to Jane Austen Centre in Bath https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CILIP-CDG-SW-EVENTS;33b59626.1404 CILIP in Hants and Wight present the following event:<br><br>Visit to Jane Austen Centre Bath (including Walking Tour)<br><br>Saturday 10th May 2014<br><br>11am \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 3.30pm<br><br>11am Visit to Jane Austen Centre<br><br>12am Lunch (not included in price) Possibly group booking in Hall and Woodhouse Bar and Restaurant near to the centre.<br><br>2pm Walking Tour of Bath [...]
